item.title: Introducing the new Godot Forum
item.description: We are finally unveiling the new Godot forum which replaces our Q&A platform while unlocking many new features.
item.dc:creator: Winston Yallow

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.2.1 RC 1
item.description: Godot 4.2 was released one week ago, and as is customary with feature updates, we have a late harvest of regression fixes to offer!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Godot Foundation Update 2023
item.description: This year has marked significant milestones for the Godot Foundation, and it's all thanks to the incredible support from our community.
item.dc:creator: Godot Foundation

item.title: Godot 4.2 arrives in style!
item.description: Godot 4.2 brings more rendering features and better platform support, it's also faster, easier to use, and more reliable!
item.dc:creator: Godot contributors

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.2 RC 2
item.description: The first release candidate brought another crop of regression reports, which we've now fixed!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Submissions open for Godot 2023 showreel!
item.description: Showcase your Godot creations in 2023! We're inviting submissions of short videos featuring your published or in-progress Godot games or tools. Don't miss this chance to be a part of it!
item.dc:creator: Emi

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.2 RC 1
item.description: With every critical bug identified and squashed, we are making our last turn and preparing to sprint to the finish line with Godot 4.2!
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 6
item.description: We're almost ready for a release candidate! This 6th beta fixes a number of regressions via some relatively core changes which will need thorough testing.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 5
item.description: More critical fixes are coming your way on the road to Godot 4.2 stable, including smoother transition for 3D projects made in 4.1.
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.1.3
item.description: With stability in mind, Godot contributors offer yet another set of changes for Godot 4.1 users, addressing a variety of bugs related to rendering, input, GUI, and platform support.
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 4
item.description: We continue iterating quickly on beta snapshots for Godot 4.2 to ensure that we can solve regressions before the stable release.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.1.3 RC 1
item.description: Another batch of fixes and stability improvements for Godot 4.1 users is ready to be tested. Of note, this release addresses a number of rendering and GUI issues, and improves class documentation.
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 3
item.description: We continue iterating quickly on beta snapshots for Godot 4.2 to ensure that we can solve regressions before the stable release.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: State of particles and future updates
item.description: An update on the current state of the particle system in Godot, and some hints about what the future holds!
item.dc:creator: Ilaria Cislaghi

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 2
item.description: After last week's 4.2 beta 1 release, we introduced fixes for a number of bugs reported by the community, which are now ready to test in beta 2.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 beta 1
item.description: With all planned major and minor features implemented, Godot 4.2 is ready for beta testing!
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.1.2
item.description: As Godot 4.2 enters feature freeze this week, a new Godot 4.1 maintenance release arrives with a handful of improvements to stability and performance!
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 dev 6
item.description: Final 4.2 dev snapshot before we enter the beta phase, and it's absolutely feature-packed!
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Maintenance release: Godot 3.5.3
item.description: It's been way too long since our previous 3.5 maintenance release! This new Godot 3.5.3 fixes a number of important issues and adjusts to changing platform requirements.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.1.2 RC 1
item.description: It's long overdue for the second Godot 4.1 patch release! This release candidate contains a number of important fixes, including performance and stability improvements, so let's give it a good test.
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.2 dev 5
item.description: Penultimate 4.2 dev snapshot brings improvements to Android plugin API, the Tilemap editor, and, well, practically everything else — making it ready for beta testing next month.
item.dc:creator: Yuri Sizov

item.title: Introducing the new Godot Development Fund
item.description: We are excited to introduce a major improvement in terms of funding the development efforts of the Godot Engine.
item.dc:creator: Emi

item.title: Godot XR update - September 2023
item.description: Updates on various things XR in Godot, a new version of the OpenXR plugin, a new version of the tools library and an update on Godot 4 support.
item.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

item.title: Release candidate: Godot 3.5.3 RC 1
item.description: A new maintenance update is in the works for the 3.5 stable branch, to update Android templates to target Android 13, and fix a number of other platform porting bugs.
item.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde
